snippet.title: Unleash - Official Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Online, multiplayer tower wars versus humans or fierce A.I. enemies. Challenging single-player tower defense scenarios. 

In a dystopian future, gifted children known as Dreamers, have the ability to materialize the monsters haunting their nightmares. Ruthless fighters exploit the Dreamers’ abilities to unleash hordes of monsters into arenas filled with massive guns, in this fresh multiplayer take on the Tower Wars genre.

The game is planned for Steam Early Access release spring 2018.

Provide your feedback and contribute to the game development by sharing your opinions!

Find Unleash online:
Web: http://UnleashGame.com
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/621940/Unleash
Discord: https://discord.gg/Unleash
Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/unleashgame
Twitch: http://twitch.com/unleashgame
Twitter: http://twitter.com/playunleash
Facebook: http://facebook.com/playunleash
Imgur: https://unleashgame.imgur.com
